emails.snippet: Dear Tazeem Mahashin, Thank you once again for taking the time to apply to our Data Science Intern, NA Integrated Analytics (2026 Summer - New York) opportunity. We have reviewed your application
emails.subject: ​​​​​​​Munich Re Group: Data Science Intern, NA Integrated Analytics (2026 Summer - New York) - Your Application
emails.body_html:
Dear Tazeem Mahashin,

Thank you once again for taking the time to apply to our Data Science Intern, NA Integrated Analytics (2026 Summer - New York) opportunity.  

We have reviewed your application against the selection criteria and decided to move forward with other candidates at this time. However, we genuinely appreciate your interest in joining our team and encourage you to apply to future opportunities with us.

You can access your Candidate Profile at any time to view/edit your details.

We also invite you to follow us on LinkedIn to stay up-to-date on our latest company news and future opportunities of interest.

Thank you,
​Your Recruiting Team
Talent Acquisition

  

​
emails.summary: Your application for the Data Science Intern (Summer 2026, New York) was not selected; you are encouraged to apply for future opportunities.

emails.subject: Blender News: Ton Roosendaal steps down and more
emails.body_text:
Hey CGDive people! Here are some quick Blender News for you, in
case you missed them. Awesome Blender VFX Breakdown I've been
following the FxForge channel for a while and their videos always
impress. This one is no exception! Watch the VFX Breakdown B...

͏

-----------------------------------------------------------------
Blender News: Ton Roosendaal steps down and more ( https://gumroad.com/toshicg/p/blender-news?purchase_id=q5XBNgUjuKIpatXoCThI3Q%3D%3D )
-----------------------------------------------------------------

Hey CGDive people!

Here are some quick Blender News for you, in case you missed
them.

*****************************
Awesome Blender VFX Breakdown
*****************************

I've been following the FxForge 
( https://www.youtube.com/@AlbinThorburn ) channel for a while and
their videos always impress. This one is no exception!

Watch the VFX Breakdown 
( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LdhfnpvfPOc )

( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LdhfnpvfPOc )

*********************************************
Blender Conference: Ton Roosendaal steps down
*********************************************

The yearly Blender Conference just happened and our hero, Ton,
announced he'll be stepping down as a leader of the Blender
project. I don't think that means he won't be involved in the
development anymore but he'll have more of an advisory position.
Either way it's the end of an era! Watch the keynote address by
Ton to learn more

Watch Keynote 
( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JXm0-ilIknE&list=PLa1F2ddGya_8u-HEvmfCVuS_OImW8HaLd&index=1 )
And a couple of rigging related talks from the conference. I'll
be watching these when I have a minute:

* Rigging Cheat Codes — Blender Conference 2025 
( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AymxOGtJoew&list=PLa1F2ddGya_8u-HEvmfCVuS_OImW8HaLd&index=53 )

* Facial Rigging for Stylized Character Animation 
( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_Ov0pFIOpug&list=PLa1F2ddGya_8u-HEvmfCVuS_OImW8HaLd&index=11&pp=iAQB )

* Rigging With Nodes Changes Everything! 
( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XS8gW_pBiBs&list=PLa1F2ddGya_8u-HEvmfCVuS_OImW8HaLd&index=63 )

* Slot it like it's hot: progress on the new animation system 
( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ypWk6ZgQ-iM&list=PLa1F2ddGya_8u-HEvmfCVuS_OImW8HaLd&index=45 )


I'm sure there are more great ones. Let me know what talks you
loved!

******************************************
Super Hive / Blender Market Sale (25% Off)
******************************************

Super Hive ( https://superhivemarket.com/?ref=356 ) (formerly
Blender Market) is running a sale coinciding with Blender
Conference. Thousands of products are discounted. It ends in 2
days, so if there is something on your whish-list, take a peek!

( https://superhivemarket.com/?ref=356 )

Check out the sale (25% Off) 
( https://superhivemarket.com/?ref=356 )Some all-time favorite
addons of the CGDive community are:

* Auto-Rig Pro 
( https://superhivemarket.com/products/auto-rig-pro/?ref=356 )  -
all in one auto-rigging (here are my tuts 
( https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLdcL5aF8ZcJuHJFQgb4altQWs-RCKA7Bq )
)
* Voxel Heat Diffuse Skinning 
( https://superhivemarket.com/products/voxel-heat-diffuse-skinning/?ref=356 )
 - an advanced "automatic-weights" algorithm (here is my tut 
( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QoKwjvuXb9I ))
* FaceIt ( https://superhivemarket.com/products/faceit?ref=356 )
- the ultimate face rigging and face mocap addon (here are my
tuts 
( https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLdcL5aF8ZcJsRd7kbXehU6tJQDRivr4Gf )
)

And some new-commers which you seem to like already:

* Vertex Skin Weights 
( https://superhivemarket.com/products/vertex-skin-weights?ref=356 )
 - weight "painting" in Edit Mode! (here is my review 
( https://youtu.be/FTTNXtPi0hY?t=461 ))
* Animation Snapper Pro 
( https://superhivemarket.com/products/animation-snapper-pro?ref=356 )
 - a great solution for parent switching and mocap clean-up
(here is my review ( https://youtu.be/FTTNXtPi0hY?t=220 ))
* Shade Shaper 
( https://superhivemarket.com/products/shader-shaper?ref=356 ) -
easy and high-quality displacement maps from color textures (here
is my review ( https://youtu.be/e-xIcBponfk?t=136 ))

Best,

-Todor/CGDive

Reply with a comment ( https://gumroad.com/toshicg/p/blender-news?purchase_id=q5XBNgUjuKIpatXoCThI3Q%3D%3D#comments )

Unsubscribe ( https://gumroad.com/purchases/eyJ2IjoiMSIsImQiOiIwTHBHejdyeFpURndpcWxuN1NOZ095WGc4QmFqRmxUcEk2RktZbXdSTncydjFvL0doTzAvTTlMVnRUcDl5N0dLMnRsL3JxZkkzM2hIWkljK0dmVGY5NlJCdG9vMStUVmtaaUdqZzJWRjZRYz0tLThBazF6eFFOSXd3YWRHN00tLXRRb0QrWENjd3FRU0JWTmM1WW5UT0E9PSJ9/unsubscribe )

548 Market St, San Francisco, CA 94104-5401, USA

Powered by

emails.snippet: Hey Tazeem, The Cerebras Team is offering office hours for hackers using our API! If you need technical support or would like project feedback, feel free to sign up for a spot here. You can also reach
emails.subject: Cerebras Office Hours
emails.body_text:
Hey Tazeem,

The Cerebras Team is offering office hours for hackers using our API! If you need technical support or would like project feedback, feel free to sign up for a spot here<https://info.cerebras.ai/e3t/Ctc/5E+23284/d12ZDZ04/JkM2-6qcW6N1vHY6lZ3l3W4ZBZS32nHsBjVsHLSb3YmGVfW98gBqX513t0mN2qC8DrkWyfqW5pbPjG5SBR8kW4HLf_P33-6flN8zp9CG1ycSkVg9zLQ59J0xDW27kypD797MFNW4n0Bj17-_DS7W2NCsrd8n5376W5qFjXJ5fVNqfVC1kyW16jhQXW72Hpzv1GfnlLVJsTZh1cpL0QN9cDzqV9y8BqW2W3gsj1XPNNQW4t7PXb7J_D6cW4qmBQ55z1x12W1w1gLB3vRPh8W3k6NPn4FNClNVYfMJN8YXfYwf6vv4-M04>. You can also reach out to us in the #cerebras-tech-support channel in the PennApps Slack.

Super excited to see what you all build!

Pearl
Growth Engineer
Cerebras Systems

--
Prefer fewer emails from me? Click here<https://info.cerebras.ai/hs/email-subscriptions/preferences/en/manage?data=W2nWGVW47zk8CW2sDJv92PQWgpW3W0D0T1X9kFwW3VWTCt2TS6yLW3JGfj436FwWwW45kh0k4rGl-xW2D05w41Y_9v2W2TlrlZ47xFRtW36vzNr45Wp3HW2TtXLD3_LSvyW1Xwbz53LS499W47P2MP38lyk-W2KyJQl1BxJxQW45S30H2vz76yW2313nb4ck2NFW3H0g1Q2PLl5SW43Z6vC43TD6XW1Xppqn4pmlj_W1ZnkQP1NtBZBW32xDYv1VszDYW2HJ0wz2RP0wKW3VZN6n2nNxS4W3NCk-t4mHZj9W43N-pf3XLZcVW3BP5c93DZvQ5W2xZ9jL4cSnWhW2WJ1Bb2qQQvbW21ksS03LX9T2W1NnC4L3b4yfyW49jQ-f2vCBZ7W49LjX72KY8vdW1X0bNY30D5WsW4tBTQY45xW10W3SzKSx1BPlQBW3XZbpD2169XpW20Wx_q32JPRcW2YCDH92TJBxD0>

Hey Tazeem,

The Cerebras Team is offering office hours for hackers using our API! If you need technical support or would like project feedback, feel free to sign up for a spot here. You can also reach out to us in the #cerebras-tech-support channel in the PennApps Slack.

Super excited to see what you all build!

Pearl
Growth Engineer
Cerebras Systems

--

emails.snippet: Searchfunder Squirrel New on Searchfunder What databases do you use to compile target companies? ‍ Tyler Doman MBA Candidate at Brigham Young University'27 ‍ Hey self-funded searchers! What
emails.subject: New posts by Tyler Doman, Dave Clark, Michael Corley, Danielle Matarasso, Joseph Terndrup and more...
emails.body_text:
[Searchfunder](https://searchfunder.com)

    
        
            
            
            
                
                    
                    
                        
                        
                        
                            
                                New on Searchfunder	
                            
                        
                        
                        
                    
                    
                
            
            
            
        
    

    
        
            
            
            
                
                    
                    
                        
                        
                            
                            
                        
                        
                    
                    
                
            
            
            
            
                
                    
                    
                        
                        
                        
                            
                                What databases do you use to compile target companies?
                                ‍
                                Tyler Doman MBA Candidate at Brigham Young University'27
                                 
                                ‍
                                Hey self-funded searchers! What databases do you use to compile target companies? I know traditional searchers often use tools like Grata, but it's so expensive. Are there cheaper, scrappier tools yo...
                                ‍
                            
                        
                        
                        
                    
                    
                
            
            
            
        
    

    
        
            
            
            
                
                    
                    
                        
                        
                            
                            
                        
                        
                    
                    
                
            
            
            
            
                
                    
                    
                        
                        
                        
                            
                                Looking for expertise in selling niche products online through Home Depot, Lowes, and Amazon
                                ‍
                                Dave Clark Succession Investors
                                 
                                ‍
                                I'm looking at a $2M manufacturer of a specialty epoxy coating that sells primarily through Home Depot online (not the stores), Lowes online and Amazon. The founder that invented the coating is also t...
                                ‍
                            
                        
                        
                        
                    
                    
                
            
            
            
        
    

    
        
            
            
            
                
                    
                    
                        
                        
                            
                            
                        
                        
                    
                    
                
            
            
            
            
                
                    
                    
                        
                        
                        
                            
                                Tips from anyone in the pool service industry?
                                ‍
                                Michael Corley Fractional Controller/CFO
                                 
                                ‍
                                I'm doing fractional accounting/finance work for a buddy who owns a pool biz here in the Dallas area (currently residential, not commercial). He wants to expand via acquisition. Problem we're running ...
                                ‍
                            
                        
                        
                        
                    
                    
                
            
            
            
        
    

    
        
            
            
            
                
                    
                    
                        
                        
                            
                            
                        
                        
                    
                    
                
            
            
            
            
                
                    
                    
                        
                        
                        
                            
                                Tax implications for seller's notes and stock sale?
                                ‍
                                Anonymous Posting  
                                 
                                ‍
                                Hello! I am modeling out a potential stock sale where the seller may hold a seller's note or forgiveable note. The seller is interested in his gains post-taxes. Does anyone have any useful resources f...
                                ‍
                            
                        
                        
                        
                    
                    
                
            
            
            
        
    

    
        
            
            
            
                
                    
                    
                        
                        
                            
                            
                        
                        
                    
                    
                
            
            
            
            
                
                    
                    
                        
                        
                        
                            
                                Accounting Deals
                                ‍
                                Danielle Matarasso

emails.body_text:
[Searchfunder](https://searchfunder.com)

# Raj in New York

  

Tax Assumptions and Structures for Searchers

In modeling returns, what assumptions do you use for taxes upon sale of the business, assuming you are actively involved? Cap.Gains treatment and are structures that rhyme with QSBS that allow gains to escape untaxed?

Join the discussion in New York: https://searchfunder.com/article/viewarticle/58941

If you're having trouble clicking the "Join the discussion in New York" button, copy and paste the URL below
into your web browser: [https://searchfunder.com/article/viewarticle/58941](https://searchfunder.com/article/viewarticle/58941)

emails.snippet: GitHub home @ShadoHax has invited you to collaborate on the ShadoHax/everything-assistant repository You can accept or decline this invitation. You can also visit @ShadoHax to learn a bit more about
emails.subject: ShadoHax invited you to ShadoHax/everything-assistant
emails.body_text:
@ShadoHax has invited you to collaborate on the ShadoHax/everything-assistant repository.


Visit https://github.com/ShadoHax/everything-assistant/invitations to accept or decline this invitation.

You can also visit https://github.com/ShadoHax to learn a bit more about @ShadoHax.

This invitation will expire in 7 days.

Some helpful tips:
- If you get a 404 page, make sure you’re signed in as Taz33m.
- Too many emails from @ShadoHax? You can block them by visiting
  https://github.com/settings/blocked_users?block_user=ShadoHax or report abuse at
  https://github.com/contact/report-abuse?report=ShadoHax

---
View it on GitHub:
https://github.com/ShadoHax/everything-assistant
emails.body_html:

emails.snippet: Here's a list of books to supplement my video lectures. A student who wished to remain anonymous compiled this list. Books in bold are highly recommended. ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏
emails.subject: "Predictive History" Reading List
emails.body_text:
View this post on the web at https://predictivehistory.substack.com/p/predictive-history-reading-list

The Dawn of Everything by David Graeber and David Wengrow
Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind by Yuval Noah Harari
The First Signs: Unlocking the Mysteries of the World's Oldest Symbols by Genevieve von Petzinger
The Elementary Forms of Religious Life by Émile Durkheim
The Wayfinders: Why Ancient Wisdom Matters in the Modern World by Wade Davis
The Forest People by Colin Turnbull
The Language of the Goddess by Marija Gimbutas
Paradise Lost by John Milton
Sex at Dawn: The Prehistoric Origins of Modern Sexuality by Christopher Ryan
Capital in the Twenty First Century by Thomas Piketty
Gospel of Thomas
The Book of Enoch
The Divine Comedy by Dante Alighieri
City of God by Augustine of Hippo
The Rise and Fall of Imperial China by Yuhua Wang
Secret History of the Mongols: The Origin of Chingis Khan by Paul Kahn
The Protestant Ethic and the Spirit of Capitalism by Max Weber
The Philosophy of Money by Georg Simmel
Suicide: A Study in Sociology by Émile Durkheim
New Atlantis by Francis Bacon
The Structure of Scientific Revolutions by Thomas S. Kuhn
The Book of the Community - Popol Vuh, Mayan Mythology
Meditations on First Philosophy by René Descartes
Faust by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
Emile, or On Education by Jean-Jacques Rousseau
Discourse on the Origin and Basis of Inequality Among Men by Jean-Jacques Rousseau
The Social Contract by Jean-Jacques Rousseau
Don Quixote by Miguel de Cervantes
The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin
Democracy in America by Alexis de Tocqueville
Anna Karenina by Leo Tolstoy
Crime and Punishment by Fyodor Dostoevsky
The Brothers Karamazov by Fyodor Dostoevsky
On the Genealogy of Morality by Friedrich Nietzsche
Tragedy and Hope: A History of the World in Our Time by Carroll Quigley
The Assault on Truth: Freud's Suppression of the Seduction Theory by J. Moussaieff Masson
Seeing like a State by James C. Scott
On the Origin of Species by Charles Darwin
The Origins of Totalitarianism by Hannah Arendt
The Open Society and Its Enemies by Karl Popper
The State and Revolution by Vladimir Lenin
Darkness at Noon by Arthur Koestler
History of the Peloponnesian War by Thucydides
Foundation (novel series) by Isaac Asimov
Peak - Secrets from the New Science of Expertise by Anders Ericsson
Observations upon the Prophecies of Daniel, and the Apocalypse of St. John by Isaac Newton
Foundations of Geopolitics by Alexander Dugin
The Dark Side: The Inside Story of How The War on Terror Turned into a War on American Ideals by Jane Mayer
End Times: Elites, Counter-Elites, and the Path of Political Disintegration by Peter Turchin
The End of History and the Last Man by Francis Fukuyama
Iliad by Homer
Odyssey by Homer
Aeneid by Virgil
Republic by Plato
Histories by Herodotus
History of Rome by Livy
Annals by Tacitus
War and Peace and War: The Rise and Fall of Empires by Peter Turchin
The Power Elite by C. Wright Mills
The Secret History of the World by Mark Booth
The Chosen: The Hidden History of Admission and Exclusion at Harvard, Yale, and Princeton by Jerome Karabel
Excellent Sheep: The Miseducation of the American Elite and the Way to a Meaningful Life by William Deresiewicz
The Little Drummer Girl by John le Carré
The Decline of the West by Oswald Spengler
The Book of J by Harold Bloom
The Horse, the Wheel, and Language: How Bronze-Age Riders from the Eurasian Steppes Shaped the Modern World by David W. Anthony
Societies of Peace: Matriarchies Past, Present, and Future by Heidi Goettner-Abendroth
Understanding Power: The Indispensable Chomsky by Noam Chomsky
Debt: The First 5,000 Years by David Graeber
Confessions of an Economic Hit Man by John Perkins
Origins of Intelligence Services: The Ancient Near East, Persia, Greece, Rome, Byzantium, the Arab Muslim Empires, the Mongol Empire, China, Muscovy by Francis Dvornik
Tower of Basel: The Shadowy History of the Secret Bank that Runs the World by Adam LeBor 
The Anglo-American Establishment by Carroll Quigley
The Wall Street Trilogy: A History by Antony C Sutton
To the Lighthouse by Virginia Woolf
Discipline and Punish: The Birth of the Prison by Michel Foucault
Omeros by Derek Walcott
Swann's Way by Marcel Proust
Oresteia by Aeschylus
The Bacchae by Euripides
Oedipus by Sophocles
Hamlet by William Shakespeare

Unsubscribe https://substack.com/redirect/2/eyJlIjoiaHR0cHM6Ly9wcmVkaWN0aXZlaGlzdG9yeS5zdWJzdGFjay5jb20vYWN0aW9uL2Rpc2FibGVfZW1haWw_.Ios6qanF_JAY__VjmVxNH-J0IrLw9KbR0soH5c2-4t4?

emails.snippet: Renewal needed for tazeemm.com's SSL certificate. Cloudflare logo Validate the domain tazeemm.com to renew its SSL certificate Review certificate request Why am I receiving this email? In order to
emails.subject: [Action required] Validate tazeemm.com to renew SSL certificates
emails.body_text:
To renew your SSL certificate, validate the domain tazeemm.com by updating its DNS records

Review certificate request:
https://certvalidate.cloudflare.com/validations/txt/acme?domain=tazeemm.com&token=aNIG-VEGWcMhWOi9KSm2QeTvRJVxzW4q7a8cu7XHi2g&certificate_pack_id=ad855cec-1d99-4787-871c-227e04b0f4af


Why am I receiving this email?
- In order to renew tazeemm.com’s SSL certificates for use on Cloudflare’s network, we need you to re-validate the domain.
- If you previously validated this domain using the HTTP DCV method, there are two possible reasons why re-validation is needed:
1. tazeemm.com no longer resolves to Cloudflare's edge, and we cannot automatically complete the renewal process
2. Recent CA/B forum rule changes state that HTTP DCV is no longer permitted for wildcard certificates.


How do I validate tazeemm.com?
Add the following TXT entries to your authoritative DNS provider:

            _acme-challenge.tazeemm.com TXT aNIG-VEGWcMhWOi9KSm2QeTvRJVxzW4q7a8cu7XHi2g
    

Finished adding the records above?
- Complete the renewal process by clicking here: https://certvalidate.cloudflare.com/validations/txt/acme?domain=tazeemm.com&token=aNIG-VEGWcMhWOi9KSm2QeTvRJVxzW4q7a8cu7XHi2g&certificate_pack_id=ad855cec-1d99-4787-871c-227e04b0f4af

When does my current SSL certificate expire?
- The expiration date is Wed Oct 22 02:38:35 +0000 2025.
 
What if I can't complete validation and renew my certificate before it expires?
- Please avoid letting that happen. If the SSL certificates expire, Cloudflare will remove them from the edge and your visitors may not be able to connect to tazeemm.com.
emails.body_html:
Renewal needed for tazeemm.com's SSL certificate.
 
Validate the domain tazeemm.com to renew its SSL certificate
 
Review certificate request
 
Why am I receiving this email?
In order to renew tazeemm.com’s SSL certificates for use on Cloudflare’s network, we need you to re-validate the domain.

If you previously validated this domain using the HTTP DCV method, there are two possible reasons why re-validation is needed:
  1. tazeemm.com no longer resolves to Cloudflare's edge, and we cannot automatically complete the renewal process
  2. Recent CA/B forum rule changes state that HTTP DCV is no longer permitted for wildcard certificates.
 
How do I validate tazeemm.com?
Add the following TXT entries to your authoritative DNS provider:
  • _acme-challenge.tazeemm.com TXT aNIG-VEGWcMhWOi9KSm2QeTvRJVxzW4q7a8cu7XHi2g
 
Finished adding the records above?
Complete the renewal process by clicking here: https://certvalidate.cloudflare.com/validations/txt/acme?domain=tazeemm.com&token=aNIG-VEGWcMhWOi9KSm2QeTvRJVxzW4q7a8cu7XHi2g&certificate_pack_id=ad855cec-1d99-4787-871c-227e04b0f4af
 
When does my current SSL certificate expire?
The expiration date is Wed Oct 22 02:38:35 +0000 2025.
 
What if I can't complete validation and renew my certificate before it expires?
Please avoid letting that happen. If the SSL certificates expire, Cloudflare will remove them from the edge and your visitors may not be able to connect to tazeemm.com.
